rows.label: tev017001_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev017001_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Otis about BLADE.

rows.label: tev017001_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev017001_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Otis what he's doing.

rows.label: tev017001_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Otis about recent developments.

rows.label: tev017001_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Otis about mimeosomes.

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0001
rows.name:
BLADEs with military backgrounds tend to have
especially haughty attitudes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't understand why they insist on addressing each
other by their old ranks when BLADE doesn't even
use ranks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0003
rows.name:
And they're always talking about discipline and such!
Why are they so wedded to a military structure that
doesn't even exist on this world?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0008
rows.name: Isn't it obvious? We're comparing our strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0009
rows.name:
The strongest person in BLADE gets to go on missions
with you-know-who.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0010
rows.name:
The missions are tough. But at least you get to do
them with a beautiful woman, right? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0025
rows.name:
It's just like the Murderess to claim a bounty by
bringing her target to the brink of death before
bagging them alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0026
rows.name:
It would have been easy to accidentally kill the target,
but she knows just when to stop.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0027
rows.name:
Be careful that you never do anything to get a bounty
on your head, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0028
rows.name:
Because as soon as you do, the Murderess will pretend
to befriend you, until one dayâ€”BAM! Knife in the back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0035
rows.name:
Isn't it kind of incredible that it's possible for a
mimeosome to get drunk?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0036
rows.name:
And thank god for that! Because there's no way I could
stay sober while in this body and on this planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0037
rows.name:
Although I wouldn't have minded if they'd removed that
whole hangover bit. Uuurgh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017001_MSG0038
rows.name:
I hope all this drinking doesn't affect my mimeosome
long-term. They wouldn't do that, right?
Anyway, I gotta go get me some hair of the dog![ST:wait ]
